item.title: Apple Crisp
item.description: Preparation Pre-heat your oven to 350Â°F. In a medium sized mixing bowl combine the flour, oatmeal, light brown sugar, baking powder, salt and butter until it forms a coarse crumble. In another large mixing bowl combine the apples, butter, flour, corn starch, lemon juice, brown sugar, salt and spices and toss to fully coat the apples. Pour the apple mixture into a 10- by 15-inch baking dish.

item.title: Brazilian Beef Stroganoff
item.description: Preparation In a large sauce pan, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil on high heat. Sear the meat for about one minute. Add the onions and garlic and cook for about 3 minutes. Add the 1⁄4 cup cognac and stir until it evaporates. Turn the heat down to medium and add the tomato paste, beef base, brown sugar, ketchup, and water. Cook about 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. In the meantime, heat the remaining olive oil in a medium skillet set over high heat, until smoking.
